title: Manifesting for Simpletons: a 30-Day Outrageously Simple Guide to Gettin' the Goods
description: Do you ever wish that manifesting could be SIMPLE? Good news: it can be... if you're willing to let it be simple. Bypassing Law-of-Attraction theory, this sassy light-hearted guide gives you a simple action plan. And it may just be the most fun you'll ever have while reading a metaphysical book. What are you waiting for? Get busy manifesting the goods, already!WARNING: Colorful Language Ahead! This book is not for the faint of heart, the easily offended, or the stubbornly intellectual. Turn back now and resume your regularly scheduled life. Thank you.
author: Debbianne DeRose
